titleStmt.title: Miscellanies upon the following subjects collected by J. Aubrey, Esq.
titleStmt.author: Aubrey, John, 1626-1697.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.

(from t.p.) I. Day-fatality -- II. Local-fatality -- III. Ostenta -- IV. Omens -- V. Dreams -- VI. Apparitions -- VII. Voices -- VIII. Impulses -- IX. Knockings -- X. Blows invisible - XI. Prophesies -- XII. Marvels -- XIII. Magick -- XIV. Transportation in the air -- XV. Visions in a beril or glass -- XVI. Converse with angels angels and spirits -- XVII. Corps-candles in Wales -- XVIII. Oracles -- XIX. Exstasie -- XX. Glances of love [and] envy -- XXI. Second-sighted persons.
